definition: an animal being fattened or suitable for fattening
details:
noun
- an animal being fattened or suitable for fattening
- an animal that feeds on a particular source of food
= example: an animal that feeds on a particular source of food
- an outdoor device that supplies food for wild birds
= synonyms: bird feeder, birdfeeder
- a machine that automatically provides a supply of some material
= example: a machine that automatically provides a supply of some material
= synonyms: self-feeder
- a branch that flows into the main stream
= synonyms: tributary, confluent, affluent
- someone who consumes food for nourishment
= synonyms: eater
